title: Indian Energy Exchange trade volume rises 56%
description: Indian Energy Exchange set a new record with a total trade volume of 13,250 million units in July 2024, an upsurge of 56% from the previous year. Electricity volumes expanded by 29%, while renewable energy certificates experienced a remarkable 405% increase. The day-ahead and real-time markets also showed substantial growth.
